sentence.Network_en: The removal of tissue body cavity, such as the uterus, by scraping with a curette.
sentence.Network_cn: 用手术刀剔除体腔里(如子宫)的有害细胞组织.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent. (as a noun): from French, from curer 'cleanse', from Latin curare (see cure)

means.word_mean: 1. a surgical instrument shaped like a scoop to remove tissue from a bodily cavity
